## Pivotting longer

```{r}
mmash %>%
    select(-samples) %>%
    pivot_longer(c(-user_id, -day, -gender)) %>%
    drop_na(day,gender) %>%
    group_by(gender, day, name) %>%
    summarise(across(value, list(Mean = mean, SD = sd), na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = day,
                values_from = starts_with("value"))
```

```{r}

tidy_summarise_by_day(mmash)
```
